programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Emotions are high in this intense story about a young girl allegedly being stalked by her molester. But when the results are read, the truth is not what it seemed.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: A man takes a lie-detector test after being accused of hurting his girlfriend's child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Jeremy hasn't seen his child in four years, but after coming clean, he wants to right the wrongs that he's done. Julie, his ex and mother of their child, doesn't buy it, claiming that he spends more time with his new girlfriends child than his own.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Are My Husband and Daughter Having Sex?
programme.desc: Holly says her mother is envious of her and has made up accusations that she has been sleeping with her stepfather; Jovanni reacts to his girlfriend's ironclad proof that he is cheating.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: How Could You Cover for Him?
programme.desc: Gina believes her grandson is being abused by her daughter's boyfriend Efrain. Her daughter wants to prove that he's innocent and is furious at her mom for accusing him. Was Gina right or is Efrain really innocent?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Jesus is worried that Sonja is sleeping with other men in exchange for Cocaine. Then, Jessica is desperate to change Josh's controlling and abusive ways. She says she can no longer live with Josh if he's going to continue threatening her and accusing her of prostitution.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Josephine's family was ripped apart after her boyfriend Mark was accused of molestation. Her son, Anthony and his girlfriend, Renee believe Mark molested their 2 year old son. But Mark believes that Renee coached her son to say this!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Mommy, Go To Jail For Me
programme.desc: In order to avoid charges, Christi abandons her ten year old daughter and leaves the state. Her daughter wants to give her one last chance to take responsibility and be in her life.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Want Justice for My Daughter
programme.desc: Cassey believes she recently uncovered her ex-husband Calvin’s evil deeds, which he was trying to cover up with gifts for his daughter, but did he actually molest her daughter? Or has she had it all wrong?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: He Makes Me Have Sex With His Friends
programme.desc: Ashley believes her husband Michael may have molested their 3 year old son. Michael says she is making up this entire story so she can divorce him. Next, Anjail believes Dwight has been physically abusing their son.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: My Kids Watch Him Hit Me
programme.desc: Jared says that he is positive that his wife Sarah is cheating on him and he admits to physically abusing Sarah because he says he hates being lied to. Sarah, who is pregnant, says that she's desperate to stop Jared's abusing ways.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Abusive Mom Takes Lie Detector Test
programme.desc: This mother is trying to regain custody of her daughter which she was convicted of abusing and neglecting. But Steve will not let her even get close to that child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Why Are You Dating A Child?
programme.desc: Sheila fears that her teen grand-daughter is having sex with a 26-year old family-friend. Then, Jaquella started dating her boyfriend Shaquille when he was a teen. Shaquille's mother is here to confront Jaquella for sleeping with her child.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: A Father's Fight for His Daughter
programme.desc: Robert believes his daughter is being abused and molested by her stepfather, John, but John and Tiffany denies any abuse. Is Tiffany covering for John’s abuse? See the shocking lie detector test today!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Brandi and Marty have been together 5 years. Brandi's brother and her mother claim that Marty is being physically abusive and has been cheating. Plus, Jessica worries that Derwin is now cheating on her and claims that he's been abusive towards her.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Amanda is here because she's trying to save her marriage to Bo. Bo's not sure if he's the father of her child and needs a DNA test to prove the truth. Plus, Julie says that she believes she's being cheated on by Stevie.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: A sisters nightmare ... 11-year-old Ana is terrified of older brother Ray who's regularly beat her since she was just five years old. Ana's fears have grown so much, she fears for her life every night when she goes to bed. While Ray is only 13, his on-stage behavior reveals his true colors, and shocks even Steve. With Ana's mother out of solutions, it's up to Steve and past guest Gary, to show Ray a better path in life and help Ana.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Melinda says that she should be given custody of Tiffany's son because Tiffany is allowing her boyfriends to physically abuse the boy. Tiffany swears that the abuse Is coming from the boys father Scott and not from her boyfriends.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: How Can You Still Love Him?
programme.desc: Joyia is desperate to keep her friend Stephanie from going back to her abusive boyfriend Scott. If Stephanie takes him back, Scott will continue to abuse her. But she still loves him! Will she have the strength to leave him?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Bobbie says that her daughter Cindy’s home was filled with so many dangerous animals that she was forced to report her to child protective services because she felt her grandchild was in danger. But Cindy says Bobbie has another agenda!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: At 12, Crystal dated 20 year old Matt and was pregnant at 13. He served 15 months in prison for criminal sexual assault on a minor and is a registered sex offender. Are they a product of inappropriate love or just misunderstood?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Steve's looking back on some of the funniest moments from his show. You'll definitely laugh out loud at these unforgettable guests. Don't miss one second of the fun on today's Steve Wilkos Show.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Loretta and Joseph have been together for 2 years and have a young son together. She says that when she was pregnant, he punched and pulled her hair. She claims that she’s been faithful but Joseph isn’t convinced. Who’s telling the truth?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: TJ refuses to let Ashley see their child after a video of her blowing marijuana smoke into the baby’s face. Then, Tiffany blames Shawn for their 10 year old daughter’s smoking and wandering the streets. Can Steve intervene before it’s too late?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: My Daughter Tried to Poison Me
programme.desc: Thomazina’s boyfriend died a year ago and she thinks her daughter, Destiney slept with him! She also suspects Destiney tried to poison her with bleach! In December, Chris and Jesse’s baby died and they blame Jesse’s mother!

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: Steve I'm 14, I Need Your Help
programme.desc: 14 year old Rusty called our show because he says that he can no longer deal with his parent's constant fighting. He says that in the past they've hit each other, thrown appliances at each other and even bit him. His mother Mildred says that she and her husband Russell always fight and abuse each other because she suspects Russell of cheating.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.sub-title: I Have Proof, You're Abusing Our Child
programme.desc: Robert says he believes that his daughters mother has been abusing her and he wants to prove the abuse and gain full custody of his daughter. Then, Casey claims her ex-boyfriend is abusive towards their kids and she wants him out of their lives.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Did Marcus’s ex’s boyfriend Charles molest their son? Ex Jamaica is torn between kicking out Charles for the meanwhile and wondering if Marcus’s girlfriend Tonya is lying to gain custody of the boy. What will Charles’s lie detector test say?

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Cynthia says her two teen daughters are sexually active and out of control. She worries their actions will lead them to an early grave.

programme.title: Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: There is nothing more serious than allegations of child abuse, but when all the testimonies are laid out, the stories just don't add up. Steve has the lie detector results and will reveal the truth once and for all.
